isis.stitle: CAB: 5000i AND 9000i CONVENTIONAL - REMOVE - WINDSHIELD WIPER MOTOR, BRACKET AND LINKAGE ASSEMBLY

svcproc.title: WINDSHIELD WIPER MOTOR, BRACKET AND LINKAGE ASSEMBLY

svcsubproc.title: Remove Windshield Wiper Motor, Bracket and Linkage Assembly on Vehicles before 2002 Engines before May 2001

step1.para:
Remove windshield wiper arm and blade assemblies. Refer to
WINDSHIELD WIPER ARM AND BLADE ASSEMBLY
, Remove Windshield Wiper Arm and Blade Assembly.

Remove cowl tray. Refer to
COWL TRAY
, Remove Cowl Tray.

Remove air duct inlet. Refer to
AIR DUCT INLET
, Remove Air Duct Inlet.

svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 87 for Items in parentheses.

note.para: Figure 87 shows the Windshield Wiper Motor, Bracket and Linkage Assembly used on vehicles with one piece windshields and the Windshield Wiper Motor, Bracket and Linkage Assembly used on vehicles with two piece windshields.

step1.para: Remove hex lock nuts and flat washers (Item 1) at both ends of windshield wiper motor, bracket and linkage assembly (Item 2).
Reach under surge tank (Item 3) and disconnect windshield wiper motor electrical connector (Item 4) from the wiring harness electrical connector (Item 5).

Remove two hex head mach. screw sems assemblies (Item 6) holding windshield wiper motor, bracket and linkage assembly (Item 2) to surge tank mounting bracket (Item 7) and remove windshield wiper motor, bracket and linkage assembly from the vehicle. Place it on clean, dry work surface.

figure.caption: Figure 87. Windshield Wiper Motor, Bracket and Linkage Assembly on Vehicles before 2002 Engines before May 2001

calloutgroup.callout1: 1. HEX NUTS (5/16-18 UNC GRADE 8) AND WASHERS (5/16)
2. WINDSHIELD WIPER MOTOR, BRACKET AND LINKAGE ASSEMBLY
6. HEX HEAD MACH. SCREW SEMS ASSEMBLY (1/4-20 UNC)

svcsubproc.title: Remove Windshield Wiper Motor, Bracket and Linkage Assembly on Vehicles with 2002 Engines after May 2001

step1.para:
Remove windshield wiper arm and blade assemblies. Refer to
WINDSHIELD WIPER ARM AND BLADE ASSEMBLY
, Remove Windshield Wiper Arm and Blade Assembly.

Remove cowl tray. Refer to
COWL TRAY
, Remove Cowl Tray.

Remove air duct inlet. Refer to
AIR DUCT INLET
, Remove Air Duct Inlet.

svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 88 for Items in parentheses.

note.para: Figure 88 shows the Windshield Wiper Motor, Bracket and Linkage Assembly used on vehicles with one piece windshields and the Windshield Wiper Motor, Bracket and Linkage Assembly used on vehicles with two piece windshields.

step1.para: Remove hex lock nuts and flat washers (Item 1) at both ends of windshield wiper motor, bracket and linkage assembly (Item 2).
Reach under windshield wiper mounting bracket (Item 3) and disconnect windshield wiper motor electrical connector (Item 4) from the wiring harness electrical connector (Item 5).

Remove two hex head mach. screw sems assemblies (Item 6) holding windshield wiper motor, bracket and linkage assembly (Item 2) to windshield wiper mounting bracket (Item 3) and remove windshield wiper motor, bracket and linkage assembly from the vehicle. Place it on clean, dry work surface.

figure.caption: Figure 88. Windshield Wiper Motor, Bracket and Linkage Assembly on Vehicles with 2002 Engines after May 2001

calloutgroup.callout1: 1. HEX LOCK NUT (5/16-18 UNC GRADE 8) AND FLAT WASHER (5/16)
2. WINDSHIELD WIPER MOTOR, BRACKET AND LINKAGE ASSEMBLY
6. HEX HEAD MACH. SCREW SEMS ASSEMBLY (1/4-20 UNC)

svcsubproc.title: Remove Windshield Wiper Motor, Bracket and Linkage Assembly on Vehicles with 2002 Engines after January 2005

step1.para:
Remove windshield wiper arm and blade assemblies. Refer to
WINDSHIELD WIPER ARM AND BLADE ASSEMBLY
, Remove Windshield Wiper Arm and Blade Assembly.

Remove cowl tray. Refer to
COWL TRAY
, Remove Cowl Tray.

Remove air duct inlet. Refer to
AIR DUCT INLET
, Remove Air Duct Inlet.

svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 89 for Items in parentheses.

note.para: Figure 89 shows the Windshield Wiper Motor, Bracket and Linkage Assembly used on vehicles with one piece windshields and the Windshield Wiper Motor, Bracket and Linkage Assembly used on vehicles with two piece windshields.

step1.para: Remove hex lock nuts and flat washers (Item 1) at both ends of windshield wiper motor, bracket and linkage assembly (Item 2).
Disconnect wiring harness electrical connector (Item 4) from windshield wiper motor electrical connector (Item 5).

Remove hex head mach. screw sems assembly (Item 3) holding windshield wiper motor, bracket and linkage assembly (Item 2) to engine side of cowl and remove windshield wiper motor, bracket and linkage assembly from the vehicle. Place it on clean, dry work surface.

figure.caption: Figure 89. Windshield Wiper Motor, Bracket and Linkage Assembly on Vehicles with 2002 Engines after January 2005

calloutgroup.callout1: 1. HEX LOCK NUT (5/16-18 UNC GRADE 8) AND FLAT WASHER (5/16)
2. WINDSHIELD WIPER MOTOR, BRACKET AND LINKAGE ASSEMBLY
3. HEX HEAD MACH. SCREW SEMS ASSEMBLY (5/16-18 UNC X 1)
